First add this to tor's config file

{{{
HiddenServiceDir /path/to/hidden_service/
HiddenServicePort 11009 127.0.0.1:8975
}}}

Next start jtorchat go to advance tab, and fill in the torsettings.

8975 can be any unused port and needs to be entered as jtorchats LOCAL_PORT and to get the socks port from the tor config aswell

Press start.
